long_description: Beefier than the Gorillapod SLR, this heavy-duty unit attaches to SLR cameras with zoom lenses or to video cameras, and can support over 6-1/2 pounds! Unlike traditional tripods, the Gorillapod SLR-Zoom doesn't require an elevated flat surface for you to take the perfect shot. An adaptable screw (from 1/4 to 3/8 inches) lets you mount a digital SLR or a tripod head of your choosing. Flexible joints bend and rotate 360 degrees to form the perfect shape. Ring and foot grips work on most surfaces, providing extra holding power.
short_description: Beefier than the Gorillapod SLR, this heavy-duty unit attaches to SLR cameras with zoom lenses or to video cameras, and can support over 6-1/2 pounds!
